column4: you can edit the Makefile to remove -Werror but you should report a bug on the nginx bugtracker
don't actually build gcc with -Werror disabled, that is a terrible idea
that is a great idea, warnings are fine

if the writers of the software put -Werror in their Makefile, it was because they want to maintain a reasonably clean and compliant codebase, and disabling -Werror on your GCC is not only a huge time sink, but subverts their intention
